li.label: anarchist
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} dislikes social pecking orders. {PAWN_pronoun} hates those who hold leadership positions, and disapproves of alliance with imperial institutions.\n\nIf imprisoned, {PAWN_pronoun} will be uncooperative with {PAWN_possessive} captors.

li.label: servile
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} wants to be led by others, and dislikes holding authority {PAWN_objective}self.\n\nIf imprisoned, {PAWN_pronoun} will be quite cooperative with {PAWN_possessive} captors.

li.label: psychic blank
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} dampens nearby psychic phenomena and is immensely resistant to direct psychic interference.

li.label: latent psychic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

li.label: latent psychic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

li.label: latent psychic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

li.label: latent psychic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

li.label: latent psychic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

li.label: latent psychic
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an innate connection to the archotechs. This connection might awaken if [PAWN_pronoun] experiences something sufficiently grand or terrible, permanently transforming [PAWN_objective] into a powerful psycaster.

li.label: awakened augur
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a powerful psycaster with exceptional sensitivity to perturbations in the psychic field.

li.label: awakened chanshi
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can use any meditation type. {PAWN_pronoun} gains psyfocus faster from meditating, and meditating takes care of {PAWN_possessive} basic needs.

li.label: awakened deluge
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is capable of using most 1st-level psycasts without expending psyfocus, so long as {PAWN_pronoun} has enough psyfocus to cast it in the first place.

li.label: awakened erudite
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is an exceptionally versatile psycaster with a wide array of abilities. {PAWN_pronoun} may also develop up to two more transcendences than other awakened psychics.

li.label: awakened incarnate
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} grows physically and mentally stronger with every psycast {PAWN_pronoun} learns.

li.label: awakened luminary
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes an aura that empowers psycasting.

li.label: awakened mantraist
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a powerful psycaster, capable of passively generating psyfocus.

li.label: awakened perennial
li.description: Once a day, {PAWN_nameDef} can draw upon a confluence of power within the psychic field, greatly enhancing {PAWN_possessive} psycasting for an hour. Outside of this period, {PAWN_pronoun} finds psycasting requires more psyfocus.

li.label: awakened sage
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a powerful psycaster with a vastly improved neural heat capacity and an exceptionally disciplined mind.

li.label: awakened siphoner
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} draws psyfocus from consuming food.

li.label: awakened titan
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} reinforces {PAWN_possessive} body with accumulated psyfocus, improving {PAWN_possessive} capabilities and defenses.

li.label: awakened undying
li.description: Instead of harming {PAWN_objective}, damage taken by {PAWN_nameDef} depletes {PAWN_possessive} psyfocus (at a ratio of 4 damage to 1% psyfocus).

li.label: psychic albatross
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} hovers, negating movement penalties from the terrain, and {PAWN_pronoun} also gains armor based on the current wind level. While meditating, {PAWN_pronoun} causes the wind to howl.

li.label: psychic anaconda
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} grows in size and strength over time. This has no upper limit, and increases {PAWN_possessive} strength, speed, and (up to a point) damage resistance; however, it also makes {PAWN_possessive} easier to hit and worse at avoiding traps.

li.label: psychic animalume
li.description: Every 1000% psyfocus {PAWN_nameDef} spends summons an anima tree somewhere nearby. If {PAWN_pronoun} dies, {PAWN_pronoun} will instantly respawn at a nearby anima tree, killing the tree.

li.label: psychic apocriton
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can exert a form of mind control on mechanoids. When {PAWN_pronoun} affects mechanoids with a psycast, they may become allied with {PAWN_objective} for up to an hour. The heavier the mech, the less likely this is to work.

li.label: psychic arcturan
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} warps nearby electromagnetic currents. {PAWN_pronoun} inflicts EMPs via attacks and psycasts, is immune to EMPs {PAWN_objective}self, and has improved sight. This control over electric currents even extends to {PAWN_possessive} own organs, protecting {PAWN_objective} against heart attacks and some forms of coma.

li.label: psychic beaver
li.description: Aided by a psychic sense, {PAWN_nameDef} can easily visualize how to assemble or break down objects in {PAWN_possessive} immediate vicinity. {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity increases up the rate at which {PAWN_pronoun} works with plants and buildings, and affects how much damage {PAWN_pronoun} does to buildings.

li.label: psychic bellbird
li.description: Word psycasts used by {PAWN_nameDef} cost +7.5% psyfocus, but affect all nearby valid targets. The radius of this effect is equal to twice {PAWN_possessive} psylink level.

li.label: psychic bluejay
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is surrounded by a protective immaterial presence, which attacks nearby foes and attempts to divert incoming blows.

li.label: psychic bouldermit
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} generates rock chunks with each psycast (and sometimes also makes more valuable metallic resources). On using a psycast of the highest level, there is a 10% chance a meteorite will fall somewhere nearby.

li.label: psychic bowerbird
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} emits a healing skipshield while meditating. The healing applies to everything in its radius, not just {PAWN_possessive} allies.

li.label: psychic budgie
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a far-reaching psychic influence that gradually improves relations with other factions.

li.label: psychic canary
li.description: Word psycasts used by {PAWN_nameDef} have a profound influence on the target, breaking unwavering loyalty, reducing resistance, and altering mood and certainty.

li.label: psychic cassowary
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} deals 2.2x damage with persona weapons, further increased by {PAWN_possessive} own psychic sensitivity.

li.label: psychic cockatiel
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a font of genius. {PAWN_pronoun} passively contributes to research at a rate scaling with {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity; if no research is currently underway, {PAWN_pronoun} instead gradually increases in skill and psyfocus.

li.label: psychic cockroach
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} regenerates from wounds, even permanent ones, unnaturally fast. {PAWN_pronoun} can even come back from death, taking somewhere between 3-15 days.

li.label: psychic cranchiid
li.description: While in water, {PAWN_nameDef} moves faster and heals rapidly.

li.label: psychic crane
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with unearthly grace. {PAWN_pronoun} can walk with surety in the most treacherous bog, and evade even the fastest blows with ease.

li.label: psychic cuckoo
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} psychically influences others to love {PAWN_objective} more than almost anything else in existence.

li.label: deimatic psychic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} repels vectors of harm on an abstract, indirect level. {PAWN_possessive} mere existence has a 50% chance to prevent many kinds of bad events from happening.\n\nHas no effect on events that occur as part of quests.

li.label: psychic diabolus
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is all but immune to high temperatures. In close-range combat, {PAWN_pronoun} repeatedly unleashes flame novas, and {PAWN_possessive} psycasts drench hostile entities and structures in chemfuel.

li.label: psychic dove
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} emits a continuous psychic soothe. {PAWN_possessive} psycasts remove mental breaks from anyone affected.

li.label: dulotic psychic
li.description: Anyone whom {PAWN_nameDef} kills is shortly thereafter raised in {PAWN_possessive} service. This second life only lasts for three days; psychically deaf individuals, as well as those who are already under this effect, cannot be raised in this way.

li.label: psychic echinoid
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} radiates an aura of pain, and is unable to feel it {PAWN_objective}self. Foes who stay within the aura for too long also begin to lose consciousness.

li.label: psychic eiderduck
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} regulates ambient temperature, enabling {PAWN_possessive} allies to survive extreme heat or cold, and protecting them from fire.

li.label: psychic electrophorus
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} emanates electrical disturbances, charging nearby batteries, calling lightning on nearby foes with each psycast, and sending EMPs through anything {PAWN_pronoun} hits in melee.

li.label: psychic emperor penguin
li.description: Whenever {PAWN_nameDef} undergoes an event that would awaken a latent psychic, a man in black appears. If {PAWN_pronoun} fulfills a condition that would awaken a latent psychic, there is a persistent but very small chance for men in black to appear nearby.

li.label: evergreen psychic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} ages so slowly as to be immortal. This effect also prevents {PAWN_objective} from developing cancer or geriatric diseases, and it reduces {PAWN_possessive} reliance on food and rest.

li.label: psychic firefly
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} generates unique solar pinholes with each psycast - the light they emit debilitates foes that get too close. {PAWN_pronoun} is also sustained by an exotic process akin to photosynthesis, greatly slowing {PAWN_possessive} hunger so long as {PAWN_pronoun} is in bright light.

li.label: psychic firehawk
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is favored by the flame. {PAWN_pronoun} is all but immune to high temperatures. While meditating, {PAWN_pronoun} emanates heat. {PAWN_possessive} psycasts can set nearby foes ablaze and inflict heatstroke on the victims; when {PAWN_pronoun} strikes, {PAWN_possessive} victims are scalded.

li.label: psychic flamingo
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is immune to fire, poison, and most environmental phenomena.

li.label: psychic fodiator
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can induce sudden and unnatural movements in {PAWN_possessive} body, making {PAWN_objective} faster and better at dodging, allowing {PAWN_objective} to travel much farther with jump abilities, and even allowing {PAWN_objective} to leap great distances under {PAWN_possessive} own power.

li.label: fossilized psychic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has had {PAWN_possessive} entire body replaced and augmented by a cyber-organic, archite-empowered material. {PAWN_pronoun} no longer bleeds, surgeries cannot fail on {PAWN_objective}, and {PAWN_possessive} bodily functions are greatly enhanced.\n\n{PAWN_possessive} psychic potential has been stymied as a result of this change; {PAWN_pronoun} can no longer gain new transcendences.

li.label: psychic fulmar
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can infrequently generate and fire arcing explosive projectiles over extreme distances.

li.label: psychic glowworm
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} causes ruptures in the fabric of space whenever {PAWN_pronoun} uses a skip psycast, damaging everything that isn't an ally between and around the target points. If {PAWN_pronoun} chooses for a skip psycast's start and end points to be the same, the radius of the effect instead increases to that of {PAWN_possessive} psylink level.

li.label: psychic gnat
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is immune to the harmful effects of most gases. {PAWN_pronoun} turns invisible while surrounded by gas, and {PAWN_possessive} psycasts skip particulate into affected foes' eyes.

li.label: psychic goldfinch
li.description: Once a day, every day, {PAWN_nameDef} regenerates towards a state of perfect health, becomes immune to the next instance of damage taken, and experiences a brief burst of euphoria. Even {PAWN_possessive} worn apparel and wielded weapons are partially repaired each time this occurs.

li.label: haastian psychic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a giant among psycasters, boasting massively expanded psychic sensitivity.

li.label: psychic harbinger
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can eat corpses to gain some of their skill experience, as well as potentially heal {PAWN_objective}self of an injury or ailment. The chance to heal scales with the corpse's body size. Moreover, {PAWN_pronoun} defers incoming damage to nearby corpses.

li.label: psychic heron
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves faster, and has doubled range with skip psycasts.

li.label: psychic honeybee
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} produces food as a byproduct of psycasting. This ability seems to work on a small but constant level within {PAWN_possessive} own body, helping sustain {PAWN_objective}.

li.label: psychic hornet
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can emit neural heat in the form of blasts of explosive energy, even while {PAWN_pronoun} is performing other tasks. This attack's range scales with {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity.

li.label: psychic hummingbird
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} becomes invisible if {PAWN_pronoun} hasn't attacked or cast an ability recently.

li.label: psychic indigo bunting
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has enhanced eyesight. {PAWN_pronoun} never gets bored of watching the stars, and using the telescope for long enough can cause a good event to occur.

li.label: psychic ivy
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} accelerates the growth of nearby plants and causes them to entangle nearby foes.

li.label: psychic jackdaw
li.description: As {PAWN_nameDef} meditates, {PAWN_pronoun} gets closer to creating a random good event.

li.label: psychic kea
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains experience in each skill when psycasting or meditating.

li.label: psychic kingfisher
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has impeccable accuracy - {PAWN_pronoun} nearly always hits {PAWN_possessive} intended target, and can find the weakest spot in virtually any armor.

li.label: psychic knapweed
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} drains the life from nearby plants to replenish {PAWN_possessive} own vitality, and {PAWN_pronoun} siphons psyfocus over time from nearby hostile psycasters.

li.label: psychic ladybug
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} inflicts heightened regeneration, toughness, and disease resistance on nearby allies.

li.label: psychic leghorn
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} periodically skips high-quality meals to {PAWN_possessive} own location. While meditating, {PAWN_possessive} meditation focus gain rate speeds up this process.

li.label: psychic locust
li.description: Every 24 hours, {PAWN_nameDef} manifests random allies - the higher {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity, the more allies are created. They're fragile and will disappear after 24 hours, but they're more psychically sensitive, and they don't need to eat or sleep.

li.label: psychic locustspawn
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a temporary manifestation and will soon disappear.

li.label: psychic lovebug
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} manifests a duplicate of {PAWN_objective}self. If it dies, {PAWN_pronoun} will recreate it after a delay, sped up by expending psyfocus or meditating. Artificial body parts are not duplicated.

li.label: psychic doppelganger
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a doppelganger of another entity. If slain, {PAWN_pronoun} will disappear and later respawn from the original.\n\nIt is not possible to remove any artificial body parts {PAWN_pronoun} may have.

li.label: psychic magpie
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} manifests additional rewards when a quest is completed.

li.label: psychic mayfly
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is subject to a bizarre temporal distortion, which enables {PAWN_objective} to sleep and meditate faster. It also makes {PAWN_possessive} ability cooldowns recover three times as fast.

li.label: psychic meerkat
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an incredibly powerful mind, and {PAWN_pronoun} emits a cerebral effect that stimulates learning and improves psychic sensitivity.

li.label: psychic mite
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} shrinks after spending enough time meditating. In this state, {PAWN_pronoun} is invisible to the naked eye and can move through ordinarily impassable obstacles. {PAWN_pronoun} returns to normal size on attacking or casting an ability.

li.label: psychic mosquito
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} removes blood from anyone affected by {PAWN_possessive} psycasts, restoring {PAWN_possessive} own body and hemogen based on the amount of blood removed. This effect cannot kill directly, as it will never bring a victim's blood loss above 50%.\n\nAdditionally, {PAWN_pronoun} cannot lose blood from open injuries.

li.label: psychic musang
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains psyfocus from the act of eating, and ingesting enough nutrition may produce a random serum.

li.label: psychic hill mynah
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains experience by psychically copying the skills of nearby higher-leveled individuals. {PAWN_pronoun} may also rarely learn psycasts from other psycasters by conversing with them.

li.label: psychic nightingale
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a better speaker and regains all but the last 10% of psyfocus spent on Word psycasts.

li.label: psychic noctule
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} becomes more physically and psychically powerful while in the dark, but wilts in the light. Becoming inspired or entering a mental break will always coincide with an eclipse.

li.label: psychic notothen
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains armor and neural heat recovery rate as it gets colder.

li.label: psychic oilbird
li.description: Whenever {PAWN_nameDef} psycasts, it creates a zone at the target's position in which {PAWN_possessive} cognition and psychic sensitivity are enhanced. Only one such zone may exist at any time.

li.label: psychic orb weaver
li.description: Whenever {PAWN_nameDef} psycasts, nearby plants grow faster, and nearby non-hostile buildings are repaired. The effect scales with {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity.\n\nPsycasting will also heal one random injury from a nearby random pawn; the heal's strength scales with the recipient's psychic sensitivity.

li.label: psychic orca
li.description: While in water, {PAWN_nameDef} moves faster and is protected from damage. Blasts of water to emit from the location of {PAWN_possessive} psycasts.

li.label: psychic osprey
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes a protective presence, flatly reducing the damage nearby allies take and slowing their fatigue.

li.label: psychic oxpecker
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} intermittently psychically tames a random animal. This effect can occur over long distances, and its frequency is based on {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity.\n\nWhen {PAWN_pronoun} affects an animal with a psycast, its health is either boosted (if non-hostile) or impaired (if hostile).

li.label: psychic peacock
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes an aura which improves the vision of allies near {PAWN_objective} and makes everything it touches look gorgeous.

li.label: psychic pelican
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can see, attack, and cast abilities from much further away.

li.label: psychic peregrine
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a 40% chance to stun anyone {PAWN_pronoun} damages or affects with a psycast. The duration scales with the victim's psychic sensitivity.

li.label: psychic pipistrelle
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} receives detailed extrasensory impressions of {PAWN_possessive} surroundings. This new mode of perception increases dramatically in potency during meditation or psycasting.

li.label: psychic pitohui
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is immune to most forms of toxicity, which includes chemical overdoses, addictions, and dependencies; food poisoning; and, to a meager extent, disease. {PAWN_pronoun} can cure someone of any such afflictions (except a genetic chemical dependency) by affecting them with a psycast.

li.label: psychic polux
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is heavily resistant to disease and toxins. While meditating, {PAWN_pronoun} reshapes the surrounding terrain, drying, fertilizing, and unpolluting it.

li.label: psychic poorwill
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can survive for long periods of time without air, food, water, rest, or fun, and {PAWN_pronoun} emits an effect that partially alleviates these needs in others as well.

li.label: psychic ptarmigan
li.description: When {PAWN_nameDef} is happy, those near {PAWN_objective} gain a variety of benefits; when {PAWN_pronoun} is sad, nearby foes are demoralized and aggravated.

li.label: psychic quahog
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} constructively shapes inanimate material around {PAWN_objective}self. {PAWN_possessive} worn and wielded equipment is repaired over time. There is a small chance, while meditating, for part of {PAWN_possessive} gear will improve in quality, or for the spontaneous creation of a high-quality book or sculpture.

li.label: psychic quelea
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is surrounded by a field of selectively weakened gravity, allowing {PAWN_objective} and nearby allies to hover (allowing them to ignore terrain movement penalties), and preventing them from triggering traps.

li.label: psychic quokka
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} broadcasts a psychic serenity detectable by animals, improving {PAWN_possessive} interactions with them, preventing them from harming {PAWN_objective}, and even causing {PAWN_possessive} psycasts to cure affected animals' scaria.

li.label: psychic raven
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} sometimes receives extrasensory visions of distant places and the near future, which {PAWN_pronoun} leverages to reveal good events afterward.

li.label: psychic robin
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves faster and has an esoteric sense that randomly points {PAWN_objective} toward objects of interest in the wilderness. This sense is useful for finding treasure while traveling in a moving caravan.

li.label: psychic rook
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} derives more usable material from plants, animals, and mining.

li.label: psychic scarab
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is surrounded by a barrier which transforms incoming damage into neural heat. If {PAWN_pronoun} overloads {PAWN_possessive} neural heat limit, the barrier will vanish for a day, though it can be regenerated far faster via meditation.

li.label: scarlet psychic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} produces luciferium by psycasting.

li.label: psychic scrub jay
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a vast "extradimensional" storage achieved through the use of a personal skipgate system. When {PAWN_pronoun} meditates, random items may be added to this storage.

li.label: sea ice psychic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is favored by the cold. {PAWN_pronoun} is all but immune to cold temperatures. While meditating, {PAWN_pronoun} saps heat from the environment. {PAWN_possessive} very presence chills {PAWN_possessive} foes; when {PAWN_pronoun} strikes, {PAWN_possessive} victims suffer from hypothermia.

li.label: psychic shearwater
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can manipulate the weather. {PAWN_pronoun} also hovers, allowing {PAWN_objective} to ignore the pathing costs of terrain.

li.label: psychic shrike
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a chance to cause good events to occur on killing another person. {PAWN_pronoun} also gains psyfocus from killing other beings.

li.label: psychic spelopede
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} summons an insect hive every time {PAWN_pronoun} spends 20% psyfocus, and {PAWN_possessive} presence pacifies all but the largest insectoids. A pacified insectoid behaves like a wild animal, though it doesn't wander very far, and even if it was originally protecting a hive it will no longer take care of it.

li.label: psychic stoat
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a 75% chance to avoid damage. Even when {PAWN_pronoun} is struck, the blow glances.

li.label: psychic stork
li.description: Every 1000% psyfocus {PAWN_nameDef} spends causes another entity to appear somewhere nearby. This new entity is allied with {PAWN_objective} and comes from a similar background.

li.label: psychic strix
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a chance to inflict madness upon foes {PAWN_pronoun} affects with psycasts. More psychically sensitive victims are more vulnerable, but psylink levels reduce susceptibility to the effect.

li.label: psychic swan
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is physically, mentally, and psychically empowered by being in a romantic relationship (or unconditionally, if aromantic). {PAWN_possessive} romantic partners and bonded animals receive a physical and mood buff too.

li.label: psychic swift
li.description: While {PAWN_nameDef} has no neural heat, {PAWN_possessive} movement speed is vastly increased.

li.label: psychic tanager
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains various physical qualities based on {PAWN_possessive} artistic skill.

li.label: psychic termite
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} deals high damage to buildings and mines much faster. Additionally, enemy buildings near the locus of {PAWN_possessive} psycasts take high damage; higher-level psycasts result in a wider radius.

li.label: psychic arctic tern
li.description: While on a caravan, {PAWN_nameDef} covers impossible distances in mere moments.

li.label: psychic thrumbo
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} augments {PAWN_possessive} melee attacks with skipgates that excise material from the victim, dealing bonus damage that ignores armor and most forms of damage resistance.

li.label: psychic touch-me-not
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} turns invisible, phases through obstacles, and moves faster for a short while after being hit (even if the hit did no damage).

li.label: psychic toxbuzzard
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} makes nearby foes more vulnerable to caustic or toxic agents. When harmed, {PAWN_pronoun} poisons nearby enemies, with a small chance to inflict acid burn.

li.label: psychic uhu
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} grows in size over time, making {PAWN_objective} more physically powerful. Spending psyfocus reverses this transformation to some extent.

li.label: psychic vulture
li.description: Random corpses appear near {PAWN_nameDef} as {PAWN_pronoun} spends psyfocus.

li.label: psychic sedge warbler
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} benefits from weaker versions of multiple inspirations at once. Those affected by {PAWN_possessive} psycasts may become inspired as well.

li.label: psychic war queen
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} periodically skips psychically tamed animals of a specific type to {PAWN_possessive} location. This effect occurs faster while meditating. New animals won't be summoned if doing so would cause the sum body size of all current ones to exceed twice {PAWN_possessive} psylink level.

li.label: psychic weaverbird
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has supernatural craftsmanship. {PAWN_possessive} creations are a quality level higher and there is a 50% chance that any item with quality that {PAWN_pronoun} creates is duplicated.

li.label: psychic whalehead
li.description: A walking portent of death, {PAWN_nameDef} terrifies foes in a vast radius, and those closer to {PAWN_objective} may even be struck by an uncontrollable urge to flee. {PAWN_pronoun} is {PAWN_objective}self nearly immune to stress.

li.label: psychic woodpecker
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can pass through solid obstacles while {PAWN_possessive} psyfocus is greater than 35%.

li.label: psychic xerigium
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is supernaturally gifted at healing. {PAWN_pronoun} heals anyone {PAWN_pronoun} tends to and always succeeds at surgery. {PAWN_pronoun} also somehow acquires herbal medicine after spending 10% psyfocus or meditating for long enough.

li.label: psychic yellowjacket
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can focus to generate bolts of energy which spring towards a targeted foe.

li.label: psychic dragon
li.description: When another psycaster or latent psychic dies nearby, {PAWN_nameDef} partakes of their dissipating psychic thalergy and accumulates a 'hoard' of energy. This energy strengthens {PAWN_possessive} psycasting and health, while also shielding {PAWN_objective} from harm. However, the energy lessens whenever it prevents damage. More powerful psycasters grant more energy.\n\n{PAWN_pronoun} also cannot be directly affected by {PAWN_possessive} enemies' psycasts.

li.label: psychic egregore
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is more thought than flesh. {PAWN_possessive} physical and mental attributes are greatly amplified by {PAWN_possessive} psychic sensitivity, and {PAWN_possessive} psychic potency is further boosted by the total psylink level of all nearby psycasters.

li.label: psychic erinys
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can strip the psychic sensitivity from others. A second application of this ability kills the victim, extracting some of their psylinks. Awakened psychics cannot be killed by this ability.

li.label: psychic harpy
li.description: Ordinary food does little for {PAWN_nameDef}, but eating a psycaster will fully sate {PAWN_objective} for a long while as well as possibly grant a psylink level. On eating the corpse of a fellow awakened or transcendent psychic, {PAWN_pronoun} will assimilate all of their awakenings and up to one of their transcendences.

li.label: psychic leviathan
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gradually develops further transcendent powers over the course of {PAWN_possessive} lifetime. {PAWN_pronoun} also has an additional awakening.

li.label: psychic phoenix
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can bring the dead back to life, though each beneficiary must spend at least 24 hours alive before this power can be used on them again. If {PAWN_pronoun} dies, {PAWN_pronoun} will automatically cast it on {PAWN_objective}self.

li.label: psychic seraph
li.description: Allies near {PAWN_nameDef} are invulnerable to direct harm, but almost totally unable to deal direct damage. {PAWN_pronoun} experiences a less pronounced version of the effects, and can be harmed. On death, {PAWN_pronoun} will pass this ability on to another of the same faction.

li.label: psychic siren
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can assert permanent mental control over others. The cooldown scales with the victim's market value.

li.label: psychic sphinx
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can grant psylink levels to others. This power always succeeds on non-psycasters, but is likelier to fail the more psylink levels the target has. A target who fails three times dies.

li.label: psychic thunderbird
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can start others on the path to psychic awakening, induce awakening in a latent psychic, or even grant a second awakening to another.

li.label: psychic wraith
li.description: When {PAWN_nameDef} is slain, {PAWN_pronoun} will transfer {PAWN_possessive} consciousness into someone else, replacing their mind with {PAWN_possessive} own. The only way to prevent this is to strike {PAWN_objective} with a persona weapon, which suppresses this ability for a day, or to kill {PAWN_objective} within an hour of transferring to a new body.

li.label: psychic ziz
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can call down destructive pillars of pulverizing force. {PAWN_pronoun} accumulates the energy to do so passively, but can speed this process up by meditating. {PAWN_pronoun} may also manifest an even more destructive effect, potent enough to obliterate cities, but this requires many days of meditation to charge.
